text: Donald Le Roy Crow (born August 18, 1958 in Yakima, Washington) is a former catcher in Major League Baseball. He played in four games for the Los Angeles Dodgers during the 1982 season, recording four at-bats without getting a hit. Crow attended Washington State University, where he played college baseball for the Cougars from 1977-1979. ==References== ==External links== Category:Major League Baseball catchers Category:Los Angeles Dodgers players Category:Baseball players from Washington (state) Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:San Antonio Dodgers players Category:Albuquerque Dukes players Category:Washington State Cougars baseball players
title: Don Crow
